Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº Let&#039;s face it, the biomex won. Mankind&#039;s attempt at saving the human race  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº failed. Now 12 months down the line we&#039;ve had time to think about what     Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº really went wrong. Did we underestimate the Mex, or were we just too hasty Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº or too arrogant? Either way we got our butt kicked and now the guy upstairsÃ‚Âº
Ã‚Âº wants to flex some more statistics.                                        Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº BEDLAM 2 : ABOSLUTE BEDLAM takes you back into your worst nightmare,       Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº only this time there&#039;s more at stake. The Biomex have gained access        Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº to some of our old abandoned nuke silos and have made them operational,    Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº and it would seem the orbital station "BEDLAM" is their primary target.    Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº                                                                            Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº Intelligence puts you in charge of a squad up to three RATT&#039;s (Remote      Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº Assault Tank MKII, each with a human crew member). Your orders are quite   Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº simple : to complete the given objectives to wipe out Biomex. Controlling  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº your RATTs from the orbital platform where you&#039;re based, you will monitor  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº their progress through satellite uplinks. The RATTs are tough, but you&#039;ll  Ã‚Âº

Ã‚Âº  Due to the overwhelming amount of feedback we  got about artists, we are  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  going  to try  this  again.  First,  we are looking  for people  who can  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  supply HARDWARE to our group.  Most  importantly 3DFX Cards, MMX  Chips,  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  and Hard Drives.  If you think you are able to help out, contact us ASAP  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  to be rewarded.  Second, we are looking for DEMO&#039;s (4k, 64k, even 4MB if  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  they are good enough)  with a CLASS theme.  The DEMO Scene and our Scene  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  used to be tightly knit.  Today, you are lucky if anyone  knows what the  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  DEMO  Scene is.  We would like to  change that, and give the  DEMO Scene  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  some much needed exposure, especially here  in the USA.  Lastly, we just  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  wanted to thank everyone for all  the positive feedback we have received  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  over the past few weeks.  It&#039;s nice to know our work is appreciated.  So  Ã‚Âº
Ã‚Âº  if  can help us  out in  any way, don&#039;t delay, contact  us today at  the  Ã‚Âº
